| **Job Title** | Operator (Pouch making machines) | **Department:** | Operations |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Team Leader |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Operate pouch making machines in a safe manner.
* Packing of finished BRCGS requirements**.**

Essential Job Functions

* Ensure requirements of the OHS Act are complied with.
* Ensure adherence to BRCGS requirements.
* Efficient running of pouch making machines.
* Interpretation & completion of documentation pertaining to product safety and quality.
* Packing of Finished Goods in requisite manner.
* Carry out maintenance work on pouch making machines in accordance with the relevant Maintenance Plans.
* Carry out cleaning of pouch making machines in accordance with the relevant Cleaning Schedule.
* Incoming inspections as per Inspection Plan.
* Picking of finished products.

Requirements

* Senior National Certificate.
* Exposure to manufacturing environment advantageous.

Other Skills/Abilities

* Attention to detail
* Mechanical aptitude
